subject: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides
Football
lead_paragraph: Aaron Hernandez is charged with orchestrating the killing of a friend, Odin Lloyd, who was found in a pit at an industrial park near Mr. Hernandez’s home in North Attleboro, Mass.
snippet: Aaron Hernandez is charged with orchestrating the killing of a friend, Odin Lloyd, who was found in a pit at an industrial park near Mr. Hernandez’s home in North Attleboro, Mass.
